Uses of Package
com.angryelectron.fona

  • Classes in com.angryelectron.fona used by com.angryelectron.fona 
    Class and Description
    Fona.Mode
    Functionality modes used with Fona.simFunctionality(com.angryelectron.fona.Fona.Mode).
    Fona.Network
    Cellular network registration status used with FonaEventHandler.onNetworkStatusChange(com.angryelectron.fona.Fona.Network).
    Fona.Ready
    Ready wait modes used with Fona.simWaitForReady(int, com.angryelectron.fona.Fona.Ready).
    FonaEmailMessage
    Fona E-mail message object.
    FonaEventHandler
    Handle asynchronous ("unsolicited") events like incoming calls and SMS messages and module status changes.
    FonaException
    Exception thrown by Fona methods.
    FonaSmsMessage
    Fona SMS message object.
    FonaSmsMessage.Folder
    Fona SMS message folders used with Fona.smsRead(com.angryelectron.fona.FonaSmsMessage.Folder, boolean).
